title: JSC Novopavlivka Directio Rusian of the Army Shelled Konstantinovka, St. George, Paraskovivka, Ugledar of Donetsk Region. Rus ...
content: At Novopavlivka direction Russian army shelled Kostyantynivka, Heorhiyivka, Paraskoviyivka, Vuhledar of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conducted airstrike at Vuhledar, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
